attributes.title: House Groove
attributes.pattern: stack(note('<[c3 ~ c3 ~] [c3 ~ eb3 ~] [f3 ~ f3 ~] [g3 ~ g3 ab3]>').sound('sawtooth').lpf(800).gain(0.6), note('<[c5 ~ eb5 g5] [~ g5 f5 ~] [c5 ~ eb5 g5] [~ bb5 ab5 ~]>').sound('square').gain(0.4), s('bd ~ ~ ~, ~ ~ sd ~, [~ hh]*4, ~ ~ ~ cp').gain(0.7))
attributes.description: Classic house music beat with funky bassline and driving rhythm
